nodes.text: Zygerrian News was a Zygerrian news outlet that operated during the Clone Wars.

In "Escape from Kadavo," the thirteenth episode in the fourth season of Star Wars: The Clone Wars, a Zygerrian News report written in Aurebesh can be spotted. While the letters translate to "Zygerria News," the "Escape from Kadavo" trivia gallery on StarWars.com translates the text to "Zygerrian News."
